pull.title: Add correct bool combiner for net signals

events.message: Add correct bool combiner for net signals

events.body: @gavinandresen No clue how to use that boost::bind inside a type descriptor. Feel free to suggest code.

> #include <boost/algorithm/cxx11/all_of.hpp>

I like the shorter, declarative code. But (looking at the include file name) does that require c++11?

This is a boost implementation of functionality already part of C++11 for older C++ compilers. 

## 

Gavin Andresen

> On Mar 9, 2015, at 6:56 AM, Wladimir J. van der Laan notifications@github.com wrote:
> 
> #include
> 
> I like the shorter, declarative code. But (looking at the include file name) does that require c++11?
> 
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub.
Ah, right, a boost-ism that can be changed to a c++11-ism, that's great

issue.title: [Net] Pre-requirements for network encapsulation
issue.body:
This is a culmination of several upstream PRs touching the P2P/Networking code, and resulting in a state just prior to the P2P/Network encapsulation, which will be it's own PR.

Backported upstream PRs included here:
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/5859
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6064
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6374
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6498
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6636
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7133
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7125
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7906
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8282
- https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8594
